cheatsheet.title: Transferring and Installing TRK Debug Agent

intro.description: Read the following information and follow the related steps to transfer and install TRK to your phone or target device.

item.title: Transfer and Install On-device Debug Agent
item.description: Connect to the device using Bluetooth or USB, then transfer and install the TRK debug agent software, App TRK (.SISX).

item.title: Using Bluetooth to transfer TRK debug agent (.SISX file) to device
item.description: Connect to the device using Bluetooth, then transfer the TRK debug agent software, .SISX file.

item.title: Using Bluetooth to install TRK debug agent on device
item.description: Install the on-device debug agent, either Application TRK or System TRK .SISX file.

item.title: Starting the On-Device TRK Debug Agent
item.description: Launch App TRK or System TRK program on the device.

item.title: Using USB to transfer TRK debug agent (.SISX file) to device
item.description: Connect to the device using USB, then transfer the TRK debug agent software, .SISX file.

item.title: Using Nokia's PC Suite to install TRK debug agent on device
item.description: Install the on-device debug agent, either Application TRK or System TRK .SISX file.

item.title: Starting the On-Device TRK Debug Agent Using USB
item.description: Launch App TRK or System TRK program on the device.
